revision.text:
{{ZScriptNote}} __NOTOC__
bool '''PlayerSkinCheck'''()
== Usage == Checks if the Actor is a player using a skin from a game different than the one currently being played (e.g. a Heretic skin in Doom).
=== Return value === Returns true if the Actor is both a player and using a skin from a different game.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]]
